thi-ap19:4.1: saṃsarantiyā → saṃsarantāya (bj); saṃsarantā me (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:9.2: jātiyāpi ca ekato → jātīsu bahuso mama (bj); jātiyā cāpi ekato (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:20.2: saṅgamaṃ te nidassitaṃ → sammukhā ca parammukhā (bj); saṅgāmantena dassitaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); saṅkamante nidassitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:29.1: Parisāhi ca catūhi → parisāhi catūhi so (bj); parisāhi catassohi (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:37.2: evaṃ patthesahaṃ tadā → tuṭṭhā evaṃ avocahaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); tuṭṭhā eva patthesahaṃ (pts-vp-pli1); evamahosahaṃ tadā (mr)
thi-ap19:38.2: patthe uttamamānasā → pattauttamamānasā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); pattamuttamamānasā (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:61.2: sutavīrehi sokinī → sutavarehi sokinī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap19:62.2: bhattunopi ca → attanopica (sya1ed, sya2ed); sutānakasakaṃ tadā (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:68.3: Rūpasobhaggasampannā → rūpasiriṃ anuppattā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
thi-ap19:72.3: Na cāpi te dutiyo atthi koci → na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr); na cāpi tuyhaṃ dutiyatthi koci (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap19:73.4: tuvaṃ māra karissaseko → na māra bhāyāmi tavekikāpi (bj, mr); māraṃ na bhāyāmi taṃ ekikāsiṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
